name: Exogenesis ~Perils of Rebirth~
description: Exogenesis ~Perils of Rebirth~ is an epic ADVENTURE GAME/VISUAL NOVEL HYBRID which combines the point-and-click gameplay of adventure games with the heavy focus on storytelling found in visual novels.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 处理器: Core 2 Duo (Core i3 or higher recommended) 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: OpenGL or DirectX Compatible Graphics Card DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
